name: AWSCodeDeployDeploymentConfigMinimumHealthyHosts
description: MinimumHealthyHosts is a property of the AWS::CodeDeploy::DeploymentConfig resource that defines how many instances must be healthy during an AWS CodeDeploy deployment.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of count to use, such as an absolute value or a percentage of the total number of instances in the deployment. For valid values, see MinimumHealthyHosts in the AWS CodeDeploy API Reference.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The minimum number of healthy instances.
